Node.Text: Good evening! I'm going to the sixth floor.
I know you're looking into suspects, so I want to tell you what I've figured out. Caroline's definitely behind all this.
I mean, come on, she's been super paranoid recently. And that stutter... it's obvious. She's clearly hiding something.
Fine, pretend I didn't say anything. But when Caroline comes for you, don't say I didn't warn you.
No, I swear, something's been up with her recently! But if you don't wanna believe me, it's your loss.
What was your relationship to Charles?
Is it really that important? If you need to know, we weren't close. I never even heard him talk.
